Package gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.grounditem

Class GroundItem

java.lang.Object
gameobjects.GameObject
gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.NonStaticObject
gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.grounditem.GroundItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bomb, Chest, Key, LifeItem, Money
public class GroundItem
extends NonStaticObject
A groundItem is a object that can be picked or moved by the hero, it uses different variables such as an Item item that represents the item given to the hero if it collides with it, it's a nullable variable.

To check what the over variable from groundItem are please refer to NonStaticObject and GameObject.

Creating a groundItem

Here's an example to create a groundItem : 

 GroundItem item = new GroundItem(new Vector2(0.5, 0.5), new Vector2(0.1,0.1), "image/item0", currentRoom, null, true);
See Also:
Hero, Serialized Form

    Constructs a new GroundItem, whose position and size are specified by the Vector2 argument, whose room is specified by the Room argument, and whose item is specified by the Item argument.

  • Constructor Details

    • GroundItem

      public GroundItem​(Vector2 position, Vector2 size, java.lang.String imagePath, Room room, @Nullable Item item, boolean consumable)
      Constructs a new GroundItem, whose position and size are specified by the Vector2 argument, whose room is specified by the Room argument, and whose item is specified by the Item argument.

      Parameters:
      position - the position of the new GroundItem
      size - the size of the new GroundItem
      imagePath - the image of the new GroundItem
      room - the room the new GroundItem will be in
      item - the item that the player will pick up by colliding with the new GroundItem
      consumable - the boolean to check whether it's a consumable object
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - unless both position and size aren't null

  • Method Details

    • animation

      public void animation()
      Not used in this class, but it's used in many other NonStaticObject, to see example of the used check Tear.animation(), Fly.animation() or Hero.animation().
      Specified by:
      animation in class NonStaticObject

    • getItem

      public Item getItem()
      Returns the item of the GroundItem, that the hero will pick up by colliding with the groundItem.
      Returns:
      the item of GroundItem

    • setItem

      public void setItem​(Item item)
      Sets what item the GroundItem is holding on too.
      Parameters:
      item - the item that the player will pick up by colliding with the GroundItem

    • getConsumable

      public boolean getConsumable()
      Returns what state the GroundItem is in, whether it's consumable or not.
      Returns:
      true if the GroundItem can be consumed , false otherwise.

    • setConsumable

      public void setConsumable​(boolean consumable)
      Sets what state the GroundItem is in, whether it's consumable or not.

      if consumable is set to true then the item will be consumable, if it's set to false then the item will not be consumable.

      Parameters:
      consumable - the consumable state of the GroundItem
